title: Miso-Butter Roast Chicken
ingredients_raw: ['1 (3½-4-lb.) whole chicken', '2¾ tsp. kosher salt, divided, plus more', '2 small acorn squash (about 1½ lb. each)', '3 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 Tbsp. unsalted butter, room temperature', '2 Tbsp. white miso', '1 Tbsp. maple syrup', '1 garlic clove, finely grated']
ingredients_processed: [{"name":"whole chicken", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"kosher salt", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"acorn squash", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"olive oil", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"butter", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"white miso", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"maple syrup", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"garlic", "heat_processed":true}]
instructions: Pat chicken dry with paper towels, season all over with 2 tsp. salt, and tie legs together with kitchen twine. Place on a rimmed baking sheet. Let sit at room temperature 1 hour. Preheat oven to 425°F. Cut squash in half through stem end and remove seeds. Cut each half into 3 wedges. Toss in a large bowl with 2 Tbsp. oil and ¾ tsp. salt.

title: Thai Red Curry Noodle Soup
ingredients_raw: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger', '2 tablespoons red curry paste', '4 cups vegetable broth', '1 can (14 oz) coconut milk', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '8 oz rice noodles', '1 red bell pepper, sliced', '2 cups baby spinach', '1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro', '1 lime, cut into wedges']
ingredients_processed: [{"name":"vegetable oil", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"onion", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"garlic", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"ginger", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"red curry paste", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"vegetable broth", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"coconut milk", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"soy sauce", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"rice noodles", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"red bell pepper", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"baby spinach", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"cilantro", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"lime", "heat_processed":false}]
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, and ginger; cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in curry paste and cook for 1 minute. Add broth, coconut milk, and soy sauce; bring to a boil. Add rice noodles and bell pepper; cook until noodles are tender, 3-5 minutes. Stir in spinach just until wilted. Serve garnished with cilantro and lime wedges.

title: Mediterranean Feta Salad
ingredients_raw: ['1 large cucumber, diced', '2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 cup kalamata olives', '200g feta cheese, cubed', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped']
ingredients_processed: [{"name":"cucumber", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"cherry tomatoes", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"red onion", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"kalamata olives", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"feta cheese", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"olive oil", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"red wine vinegar", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"dried oregano", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"salt", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"black pepper", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"fresh parsley", "heat_processed":false}]
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, and feta. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper. Pour dressing over salad and toss to coat. Sprinkle with fresh parsley before serving.

title: Double Chocolate Brownies
ingredients_raw: ['200g dark chocolate', '175g unsalted butter', '325g caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '130g all-purpose flour', '50g cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '100g chocolate chips']
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease and line a 9-inch square baking tin with parchment paper. Melt chocolate and butter in a heatproof bowl over simmering water. Whisk in sugar, then eggs one at a time. Fold in flour, cocoa, and salt until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Pour into prepared tin and bake for 25-30 minutes until set but still slightly fudgy in center.

title: Vegetable Pad Thai
ingredients_raw: ['8 oz rice noodles', '3 tbsp vegetable oil', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 carrot, julienned', '1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced', '100g bean sprouts', '3 tbsp soy sauce', '2 tbsp brown sugar', '2 tbsp lime juice', '1 tbsp sriracha', '1/4 cup chopped peanuts', '3 green onions, sliced', '1/4 cup cilantro leaves']
ingredients_processed: [{"name":"rice noodles", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"vegetable oil", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"eggs", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"garlic", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"carrot", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"red bell pepper", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"bean sprouts", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"soy sauce", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"brown sugar", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"lime juice", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"sriracha", "heat_processed":true}, {"name":"peanuts", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"green onions", "heat_processed":false}, {"name":"cilantro leaves", "heat_processed":false}]
instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water for 10 minutes until softened, then drain. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat. Add eggs and scramble until set, then transfer to a plate. Add remaining oil to wok. Stir-fry garlic for 30 seconds, then add carrot and bell pepper for 2 minutes. Add noodles, soy sauce, sugar, lime juice, and sriracha; stir-fry for 3 minutes. Mix in eggs and bean sprouts. Top with peanuts, green onions, and cilantro before serving.

title: Fresh Tomato Bruschetta
ingredients_raw: ['6 ripe tomatoes, diced', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped', '2 tbsp balsamic vinegar', '3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 tsp salt', '1/4 tsp black pepper', '1 baguette, sliced diagonally']
instructions: In a bowl, combine tomatoes, onion, 2 cloves minced garlic, basil, vinegar, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 30 minutes to marinate. Preheat broiler. Brush baguette slices with remaining olive oil and rub with remaining garlic cloves. Place on baking sheet and broil until golden, about 1-2 minutes per side. Top toasted bread with tomato mixture just before serving.
